extendedInfo.description: Cyberon Voice Commander is a voice dialing and command-and-control application that provides users to:-Make phone calls-Look up contact info-Launch programand more.Features:*Speaker-Independent, no training is required.*Hands-free(for Android 2.2 and above) and eyes-free.*High accuracy.For enabling BT handsfree voice dialing function, please be noted to check below items:1. Make sure that the platform of your phone is Android 2.2 (Froyo) or above, and your headset supports Bluetooth handsfree profile.2. Don't install the application on SD. Cyberon Voice Commander doesn't support APP2SD so far.3. Restart your phone after installing Cyberon Voice Commander.4. Re-pair BT headset and phone after installing Cyberon Voice Commander, if they have been paired.On sale for $5.99!"Full refund can be made within 48 hours after purchase. To request a refund, please send your order number to info@cyberon.com.tw"**** additional information *****On Jelly Bean (Android 4.1), please be kind to update Google Search to the last version, then go to "Settings"->"Apps"->"All", find Google Search and clear the default, Voice Commander could be launched by pressing the BT headset's button in the end.

reviews.title: Terrific voice recognition
reviews.comment: This app works great for Bluetooth voice dialing. As desired, it repeats back what it thinks I want. I answer Yes if it understood me and No if it didn\'t. The answer is usually Yes because it has very good voice recognition--better than the Choice Dialer I was using on my previous Gingerbread phone. It works well even when I\'m driving. It didn\'t work well when I tried it in a noisy restaurant today, but I didn\'t expect it to. Ice Cream Sandwich on a ZTE Engage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well...
reviews.comment: The app is okay... Would have been better, and \"hands free\", if I didn\'t have to always launch app. Won\'t even respond to a long press of the call button. Almost wished I didn\'t purchase the app.
reviews.author: James Herald

reviews.title: Unhappy :0(
reviews.comment: One star until the devs decide to listen to paying customers and fix the issues brought to their attention. Below please read my email to them. Hope this hits a nerve. Hi, \302\240 I\'ve emailed you guys in the past but thought I\'d give it another try. I too have been having issues with my Galaxy S3. I constantly have to set this app as the default. I also purchased the Voice Speed Dial app as well. Having the same problem with this one. I emailed you about my issues and all I got from you was an offer to refund...
reviews.author: Ruben Chaves

reviews.title: Finally off network voice dialing
reviews.comment: Finally my latest and greatest S3 can do want my ten year old phone  could do! Speaker independent voice dialing. Not a fancy app, but it does what it supposed to. Works with my blue ant hands free bluetooth box for my car. Long press the call button and the voice dialer launches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Loud crisp voice, reminds me of old windows phone voice dialer...  It just worked... This is worth the money and more accurate than others out there..  and probably better than the one in your phone...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cures Samsung S3 BT Dial With Pin/Pattern Lock
reviews.comment: Version 3.1, after freezing S-Voice with Titanium Backup, provides BT headset dialing with a pattern or pin lock on the Galaxy S3!  I Believe it uses the built-in voice recognition, but is now working GREAT!  Google and Vlingo\'s voice engines are far from perfect, but after applying the LG8 Sprint update, it\'s much more accurate!  I am thrilled to say the least!  Way to go, Cyberon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine most of the time
reviews.comment: Used this on Windows Mobile works just as good on my HTC Vivid the voice recognition could do with an update it gets names wrong sometimes and it doesn\'t pick up too well in the car with the glass down but that being said it works fine otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best of a bad lot
reviews.comment: Problem that I find with Android in general is that all the voice dialers stink when used with a Bluetooth headset.  This is true for my HTV EVO Design 4g and my wife\'s Galaxy S1.  To make things more difficult, I use a battery manager to keep my data connection off in order to save battery life.   I use a Plantronics M1100 headset. This app works without a data connection, and about 60% of the time works flawlessly.  40% of the time it is frustrating as hell!  Mis-dials, closes, and simply can\'t understand me. It\'s far from great, but does better than most.  Without the ear headset, this app and many others work very well.
reviews.author: Eric Falk

reviews.title: Cyberon Voice Commander Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is amaising. All most allways recognizes my command. Sometimes gets confused when 2 names are the , and I don\'t say last name, or don\'t have last name programmed, but hey that\'s my fault. Can start other apps even other voice controll apps like vioce actions where you can dial any number from.
reviews.author: Hal Fountain

reviews.title: Works Great Until You Reboot
reviews.comment: I\'m running this on Jelly Bean 4.1.1 on an HTC EVO LTE  It does work but the whole reason I wanted it is to dial over Bluetooth while it stays in my pocket while driving,  However if I rebooted the phone since I last used the Bluetooth Headset it will Prompt for me to select which application to associate again.  Also it\'s frustrating there is no demo version and no return after 15 minutes and it took a LOT longer than 15 minutes to realize it has this annoying problem after every reboot.
reviews.author: George Mills

reviews.title: No Bluetooth on gnex
reviews.comment: Restarted and re-paired enough times that my refund window ran out but still won\'t run on Bluetooth headset button press , I even disabled Google search (aka made the phone unusable) like some forum posts suggested utter garbage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suitable replacement for S voice on GS3
reviews.comment: This app allows you to give your GS3 some simple voice commands WITHOUT a data connection. Tested the app with DATA and WiFi turned OFF and it still works!!!   Works well with finding contacts, making calls, messaging, and starting apps hands-free. Would give the app a 5 star rating if it could have more commands: like finding and playing a play list.  Other than that if you need a simple voice command app that works with a poor---or NO-- data connection. This one is for you.
reviews.author: Erik Licht

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Won\'t work with GS3 999 Mod( Cryogen)  does nothing at  all .... you can hear \" Say command \" but the program won\'t recognize any commands or function at all really.... Any feedback will be appreciated.
reviews.author: Larry Drake

reviews.title: Voice dial by contact, wont dial by number.
reviews.comment: Almost solves ICS voice dialing problem. Nice little APP. It will dial a contact in your phone book and you can redial and callback that you could not do with Vlingo, but you cant voice dial a phone number via bluetooth (or any other way for that matter) Where bluetooth is concerned, I have not found a phone OS better than Windows Mobile/Phone. One would think with all the focus on hands free now-a-days that OS and handset makers would give you more bluetooth,,,, not less. Go figure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fair and simple.
reviews.comment: Fair and simple, but I need something with more commands.  Good if you just want voice dialing and to open applications and other basics things
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugly interface.
reviews.comment: Crappy interface. Limited options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: enables Ics Bluetooth voice dialing
reviews.comment: Seemed to a solve ics Bluetooth voice dial problem in a very quiet environment but it was useless when I was driving.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: I did as the instructions said for S3 with Jelly Bean but when phone locked with pattern it still wont make calls. So much for hands free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Works amazing at recognition!
reviews.author: Chris Herrera

reviews.title: No Bluetooth dialing
reviews.comment: Will answer phone calls. Will not initiate phone calls using only Bluetooth headset. Even pushing the program button it doesn\'t recognize what is being said. It is not even close to what is being said.  I\'m using Galaxy Skyrocket and Cardeo Scalar Rider G4 Bluetooth helmet set.
reviews.author: A Google User
